# VEHICLE::SET_DIP_STRAIGHT_DOWN_WHEN_CRASHING_PLANE

## Summary
Will make plane dip straight down in the crash task, rather than spinning out of controll randomly

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** dipDownOnCrash
